root.Summary: 1: Tanaka T, Abe H, Kimura M, Onda N, Mizukami S, Yoshida T, Shibutani M.Developmental exposure to T-2 toxin reversibly affects postnatal hippocampalneurogenesis and reduces neural stem cells and progenitor cells in mice.
